channel.title: Czar source flitch i geuss
channel.description:
when i go into my character files in czar source and try to make one of my char's a member i type in with 1 in ismember instead of the 0
like: ismember = 0 > ismember = 1 _________________________________ then i log into my acc and is says member n0 s0rr0wz logged in this account is not member ... i try to ge in member portal and i says
u teleportto a members area u need to be a member to teleport to this area (or something like that)
anyways how the heck i can fix this???
thx
